page.title: 10Inverarity Community Council
page.content: The Council was formed on April, 27th 1977.It is made up of 8 members who are democratically elected by the residents of the area.It deals with any matters involving the people of the district.It has dealt with_ The removal of a dangerous tree at Inverarity Church corner. A school bus shelter plus seats at Whigstreet. Meetings are held on the first Tuesday of every second month in the school G.P. room. For the future the council hopes to be of continued service to the community.
